ePub viewer webapp with dictionary*, themes, search, and more...
======
* To consult the dictionary simply select the single word of the book and automatically open a pop-up with the definition. The dictionary function is active only online
======
- Modern, responsive UI
- Themes, fonts, line spacing, margins, font size settings
- Search panel
- About view
- Go to page or chapter
- Location numbers
- and more...
======
Important notation: to open the web application, simply click on the extension icon at the top right of the browser, located next to the address bar.
======
The ePUB Viewer/Reader is Chrome extension and web app which enables reading ePub-files just in the browser. 

Main Features:
- open in home page your ePubs with click and select file from your file system;
- ebook index consultation;
- panels to advanced settings to choose font size, themes and more;
- convert web page or online pdf to ePUB with online tools using context menu;
- export page or chapter as html or pdf format
- cloud print or save page or chapter to Google Drive
